attributes.action: Create a new national bank holiday to commemorate the COVID-19 national effort
attributes.additional_details:
From lockdowns for the public to the efforts from NHS and other key workers. All of it deserves to be celebrated and remembered as one of the hardest and most trialling times for the British public in living memory.
 
It would also serve as a way to remember all the people we have lost to this disease.
attributes.background: Create a new national bank holiday to recognise the national efforts of the British public in regards to COVID-19.
